page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This area was studied jointly by the fourth year children of{MORFA JUNIOR {SCHOOL }and {HALFWAY C.P.SCHOOL:}both of which are in {LANELLI,DYFED}. The study was made in JULY,1985. The area studied is the eastern side of town (population:c.40,ooo) containing residential areas, agricultural areas,industrial areas, coastal areas and waste land. The area has a history of much heavy industrial growth but in recent years the area has suffered from the problems of the economic recession which has affected the local steel and tinplate industry,on which there has been much dependence by the people of the locality. Recently, however, there has been slight growth in technological manufacturing industry in the locality.
